overview: Enter a story that will walk you through the lives of several different teenagers living in a small town. Discover how their decisions affect their own lives as well as the lives of those around them. The character and values of each teen will be tested in situations that they are presented with in every day life. They will play out in 7 different stories that are all interlaced. From a group of friends breaking into a home, a mysterious box that must be guarded, to two girls waiting to hear from their crush, and a duel between musicians and more. These are only some of the different scenarios that will bring everyone to an unexpected ending.
title: Corazón de campeón
